name: Universidad de Sevilla
description:
The University of Seville is a public higher education institution with over 500 years of history yet which at the same time is characterized by its youthful, enterprising and dynamic personality. It has obtained an international reputation for its high academic standards, and has achieved excellence in terms of scientific productions, social relations and production network.
The University of Seville is located in Andalusia, in the south of Spain (Southern Europe).
